issue.title: adguard.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://adguard.com/kb/guides/report-website/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fadguard.com%2Fkb%2Fguides%2Freport-website%2F) ### Comment > I get emails from SBS News here in Australia and when I have Adguard enabled, I am not able to click on the news items contained in the SBS email to be able to view the contents. When I disable Adguard , clicking on the SBS News item successfully takes me to Google, wher I can read the article. Username: `marshallmonica80@gmail.com` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/t8g333vodi8k4kwgg8oo0ck4ww4k4wg4b7x1emrpgy.jpg?nc=1)
